Title: AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF TWENTY, TWO THOUSAND FIVE HUNDRED PESOS TO CARRY OUT THE PURPOSES OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED THREE HUNDRED TWENTY-FIVE DURING THE FISCAL YEAR NINETEEN HUNDRED AND THIRTY-NINE.
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 388, September 05, 1938 ]
AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF TWENTY, TWO THOUSAND FIVE HUNDRED PESOS TO CARRY OUT THE PURPOSES OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED THREE HUNDRED TWENTY-FIVE DURING THE FISCAL YEAR NINETEEN HUNDRED AND THIRTY-NINE.
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The sum of twenty-two thousand five hundred pesos or so much thereof as may be necessary, is appropriated out of the funds in the Treasury of the Philippines not otherwise appropriated for the following purposes:


1 Two field auditors, at P3,000 per annum each......................................
₱6,000.00


2 Two field auditors, at P2,400 per annum each ....................................
₱4,800.00


3 Two field auditors, at P1,800 per annum each ....................................(awÞhi(
3,600.00


4 Two clerk-stenographers, at P1,200 per annum each .........................
2,400.00


5 Consumption of supplies and materials.................................................
1,600.00


6 Traveling expenses and per diems of personnel ..................................
4,100.00


Total ......................................................
₱22,500.00


Section 2. The balance of the appropriation provided in this Act remaining on December thirty-one, nineteen hundred and thirty-nine, shall revert to the Treasury of the Philippines.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect on January first, nineteen hundred and thirty-nine.
Approved, September 5, 1938.
